room_title: Escape room "Escape The Lost Pyramid VR" by Escape Room Sports in Pittsburgh
room_description: Welcome to the Animus! It's February of 1928. An expedition led by Sir Frye disappears somewhere in the Sinai Peninsula. A team of four and a dozen indigenous porters were looking for the Lost Pyramid of Nebka.. They were never seen again. Using the simulation reconstructed from their DNA memory, your team will put themselves in the shoes of the explorers. Find out what happened to the expedition. And more importantly: locate what they were looking for!
